name: The Monstrous Horror Show
description:
Four protagonists gathering in an abandoned hospital. Can they escape safely and regain their peaceful daily life?

■ Game content
-You can play from your favorite hero by selecting a scenario.
・ Search for abandoned hospitals from a horizontal perspective. Phantoms may chase after you while exploring !!
・ If you get caught by a monster, the end will be disastrous. Reliable design that allows smooth retries.
-Many implementations such as gimmicks, battles, and dot character productions that will liven up the game !!
-You can play with either the mouse or keyboard! It works with the gamepad.

■ H related
・ H in the scenario records hard play such as humiliation and tentacles!
・ In prisons, there are situations that are close to Japanese rape because of their liking!
-Text-related functions are implemented to some extent! (High-speed skip, auto text, etc.)
